scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=worker & npm run dev --workspace=web
scripts.nuke: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -print -exec rm -rf '{}' \; && find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -print -exec rm -rf '{}' \;
scripts.dx: dotenv -e .env -- npm i && npm run infra:dev:up && cd web && npm run db:reset && npm run db:seed:examples && cd .. && npm run dev
